Description.Text: Rooms with a living room, a small kitchen with fridge and kitchenette, shower, balcony or veranda.

Cosmi apartments is located in a quiet resort about 5 minutes walk from the beach (300 meters) where you will find a variety of bars and restaurants. The main city center and most popular nightlife district is about 15 minutes away. There is also a bus stop. Gouves is about 17 km from Heraklion airport.
